localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: The ultimate app for all foodies, art lovers, keen shoppers, and urban explorers - simply organise the places you need and love, in any city in the world!
blogPost.body: The ultimate app for all foodies, art lovers, keen shoppers, and urban explorers - simply organise the places you need and love, in any city in the world!
blogPost.title: Urbaniser - Your New City Organiser. Never Forget a Place!
blogPost.author: Idan Gal-Shohet

localize.description: 对于所有美食家、艺术爱好者、热衷于购物的人和城市探索者来说，这是一款终极应用--只需简单地组织你所需要和喜爱的地方，在世界任何一个城市。
localize.tagline: 你的新城市组织者。不要忘记一个地方!

localize.description: 對於所有美食家、藝術愛好者、熱衷於購物的人和城市探索者來說，這是一款終極應用--只需簡單地組織你所需要和喜愛的地方，在世界任何一個城市。
localize.tagline: 你的新城市組織者。不要忘記一個地方!

previous.excerpt: This is an app for people to find boba drinks nearby. It allows you to rate individual boba drinks, so that you don't have to read through lots of reviews to see which boba is good.
previous.title: Bubble - App for finding and rating Boba

localize.description: 这是一款为人们寻找附近的波霸饮品的应用。它可以让你对各个波霸饮品进行评价，这样你就不用通过大量的评论来查看哪家波霸饮品好了。
localize.tagline: 用于寻找和评级波霸的应用程序

localize.description: 這是一款爲人們尋找附近的波霸飲品的應用。它可以讓你對各個波霸飲品進行評價，這樣你就不用通過大量的評論來查看哪家波霸飲品好了。
localize.tagline: 用於尋找和評級波霸的應用程序
